medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient developed abdominal pain 3 days ago, located in the bilateral lower quadrants. Over the past day, she has experienced semi-formed stools but not her normal bowel movements while continuing to have abdominal pain. She denies fever but reports chills and anorexia. She is primarily on a liquid diet.
medical_history.past_medical_history: 1) Mild intermittent Asthma. No prior hx of intubation/hospitalization. 2) Osteoarthritis (OA). 3) Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS). 4) Hypertriglyceridemia. 5) Gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD). 6) Idiopathic neuropathy. 7) History of gastrointestinal bleeding (GIB).
medical_history.family_history: Mother: colon cancer; Father: lung cancer; Sister: colon cancer; Sister: breast cancer.
